column4: \o:  what the crap happened to my firefox?  middle-click to paste a link no longer works...
just configure it. And please help keep this channel G-rated.
I'm curious, where is this configuration at?  I'm not seeing it in the Edt/Preferences dialog box
go to about:config, filter for middle, set middlemouse.contentLoadURL to true
if a package manager crashes, it can leave its lock file behind in that dir
